name: frigate-notify
description: Frigate Notify is a companion tool for sending Frigate camera events into platforms like Apprise or SMS. It supports event triggers, notifications, and media previews for users running local security stacks.
features: Notifications: Send Frigate events to Apprise or SMS, Event triggers, Media previews. Stay informed of camera activity.
Multi-Platform: Support various notification services. Flexible alerts.
Event Filtering: Customize what triggers notifications. Relevant alerts only.
Security Stack: Perfect for local surveillance. Enhanced monitoring.
Media Attachments: Include snapshots in alerts. Visual context.
Custom Templates: Format notifications. Personalized messages.
Zone-Based: Alert on specific areas. Targeted notifications.
Cooldown Periods: Prevent alert spam. Smart throttling.
